nodes.title: A Genuine Testimony
nodes.description:
....

On the stand, Depp also answered a question about what it has been like for him to listen to Heard’s testimony during the trial.

“Insane,” he said, “It’s insane to hear heinous accusations of violence, sexual violence … that she’s accusing me of. (It’s) horrible, ridiculous, humiliating, ludicrous, painful, savage, unimaginably brutal, cruel.”

Depp added that “no human being is perfect” and once again denied the allegations.

“I have never in my life committed sexual battery, physical abuse, all these outlandish, outrageous stories of me committing these things,” he said. “And living with it for six years, and waiting to be able to bring the truth out.”

He said that “no matter what happens I did get here and I did tell the truth and I have spoken up for what I’ve been carrying on my back, reluctantly, for six years.”

Source: USAnews

nodes.title: They Want to Silence US
nodes.description:
Dear Everyone.... 

Just to update you... that since the petition is going more and more viral on social platforms... probably my name as someone who started the petition and active on twitter and facebook sharing my opinions and the link to the petition.. i am being constantly reported on FB and not able to comment or share the link. and it is happening to many others.

they want to silence us. but they don't know that this is not about me or us. this is about Johnny Depp. this is about the truth. this is about All the Real Domestic Violence victims. this is about the Abused victims. and it seems now it is also about being entitled to have an opinion and say it out loud!

In the love of Truth, i ask you to keep sharing the link of the petition with at least the following hashtags:

https://chng.it/7QKLz8GB8y #AbuseHasNoGender #justiceforjohhnydepp #AmberHeardlsAnAbuser

Sincerely,

A Truth Fan

nodes.title: Blake Lively &Ryan Reynolds Match $1 Million in Donations to Support Displaced Families from Ukraine
nodes.description:
When Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds pledged $1 million to support displaced families from Ukraine, Americans responded.

On Saturday, February 26, Lively and Reynolds announced on their social media platforms their commitment to matching donations up to $1 million, and in less than 48 hours the match was met to provide lifesaving aid, protection and hope for displaced families from Ukraine.

“The outpouring of compassion for displaced people from Ukraine has been incredible. We’re proud to support USA for UNHCR and its work to provide emergency supplies, lifesaving care and hope – but we’re even more proud of the generous community of supporters that joined us. Thanks to them, families will have support, stability and hope during their darkest moments,” said Lively and Reynolds.

Source: https://www.unrefugees.org/

nodes.title: Reason Why Johnny Depp Refuses To Look At Amber Heard Revealed During Trial
nodes.description:
If you've been watching the trial, you will have noticed that while his ex-wife has given testimony, Depp has kept his gaze at the computer screen showing her testimony.
Despite her sitting right in front of him, he insists on watching her through the screen.
Now we finally know why.
As Heard testified yesterday (May 17), she was quizzed about how her ex-husband avoids her gaze.
Depp's lawyer, Camille Vasquez, asked Heard while she was on the stand: "You know why he won't look at you. He told you you would never see his eyes again."
It was revealed that Depp told her back in 2016 that he will never look at her again after she publicly accused him of domestic violence.
An audio recording was played at the trial where Depp could be heard saying: "I am nothing to you, and I will always be nothing to you. You will not see my eyes again."

source: LADBIBLE
